timelineItems.title: Set Your Budget
timelineItems.description: Determine your total budget and how to allocate it

options.label: Medium Range
options.description: Balance of quality and cost with some premium services

timelineItems.title: Choose Wedding Party
timelineItems.description: Select your bridesmaids, groomsmen, and other key roles

timelineItems.title: Book Venue
timelineItems.description: Secure your ceremony and reception venues

timelineItems.title: Book Photographer
timelineItems.description: Research and book your wedding photographer

timelineItems.title: Order Wedding Dress
timelineItems.description: Start shopping for and order your wedding dress

options.label: Ball Gown
options.description: Classic princess-style dress with full skirt

options.label: A-Line
options.description: Flattering silhouette that suits most body types

options.label: Mermaid
options.description: Fitted through hips, flares at knees

timelineItems.title: Book Caterer
timelineItems.description: Select your catering service and plan the menu

timelineItems.title: Send Invitations
timelineItems.description: Mail out wedding invitations to your guest list

options.label: Traditional Paper
options.description: Classic printed invitations with RSVP cards

timelineItems.title: Order Wedding Rings
timelineItems.description: Choose and order your wedding bands

options.label: Classic Gold Bands
options.description: Traditional yellow or white gold rings

options.label: Custom Design
options.description: Personalized rings with engravings or unique design

timelineItems.title: Book Music/DJ
timelineItems.description: Secure entertainment for ceremony and reception

timelineItems.title: Final Dress Fitting
timelineItems.description: Schedule final dress alterations and fitting

timelineItems.title: Create Wedding Day Timeline
timelineItems.description: Finalize wedding day schedule with vendors

timelineItems.title: Final Vendor Confirmations
timelineItems.description: Confirm final details, timing, and setup with all vendors

timelineItems.title: Wedding Rehearsal Planning
timelineItems.description: Organize rehearsal dinner and ceremony practice details

timelineItems.title: Final Guest Count
timelineItems.description: Provide final headcount to venue and caterer

timelineItems.title: Beauty Appointments
timelineItems.description: Hair trial, facial, and other beauty preparations

options.label: Hair & Makeup Trial
options.description: Test run of your wedding day beauty look

options.label: Manicure & Pedicure
options.description: Perfect nails for your special day

timelineItems.title: Pick Up Wedding Attire
timelineItems.description: Collect wedding dress, suits, and accessories

timelineItems.title: Pack Wedding Day Kit
timelineItems.description: Emergency supplies, makeup, accessories, and documents

options.label: Emergency Kit Items
options.description: List items for your wedding day emergency kit

timelineItems.title: Obtain Marriage License
timelineItems.description: Ensure marriage license is ready and valid

timelineItems.title: Prepare Ceremony Items
timelineItems.description: Prepare rings, vows, and other ceremony essentials

timelineItems.title: Enjoy Your Wedding Day!
timelineItems.description: Relax and celebrate your special day
